channel.title: Hiya, I'm Sachin from Braid
channel.description:
Heya folks - I'm Sachin Agarwal, the founder of Braid - braidhq.com . Braid's project management and team coordination built _inside_ of Gmail, Google Calendar, and Google Apps as a Chrome extension.
Braid's totally bootstrapped and I've taken what I've learned from working at Oracle, SAP, Google, and a bunch of other startups to build the Chrome extension, a prototype iOS app, and get a bunch of customers without spending a lot of cash.
Happy to have found this forum and thrilled to learn with everyone else here.

item.title: Hiya, I'm Sachin from Braid

item.description:

Braid’s totally bootstrapped and I’ve taken what I’ve learned from working at Oracle, SAP, Google, and a bunch of other startups to build the Chrome extension, a prototype iOS app, and get a bunch of customers without spending a lot of cash.
